thread.title: You Need to See Every Limited-Edition Rainbow Shade of Tarte's Gel Liner
thread.title_full: You Need to See Every Limited-Edition Rainbow Shade of Tarte's Gel Liner

author: Emily Orofino
title: You Need to See Every Limited-Edition Rainbow Shade of Tarte's Gel Liner
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 You Need to See Every Limited-Edition Rainbow Shade of Tarte's Gel Liner 
If you're headed to the Indio Valley to see Lady Gaga at Coachella this Spring, you should already be planning your colorful festival beauty look. After mastering hair tapestry , start practicing your intricate face paint designs . . . and pick up some vibrant new products to do them with! Tarte recently released 11 new, limited-edition shades of its cult-favorite Clay Pot Waterproof Shadow Liner. 
Don't expect standard hues like black and brown in this assortment. It's chock-full of punchy pastels and vibrant metallics that are perfect for Spring and Summer including a mint green, shimmering lavender, peacock blue, and a trendy white. (See more ideas on how to wear white liner here .) The longwear, waterproof formula makes them ideal for creating temporary body art — the designs won't sweat off in desert heat! 
If you need these dreamy tints in your stash, act fast: they won't be around for long. Keep reading to see swatches of them for yourself. Related:
